DIA_Novize_01_SQ508_Cutscene_03_01: I tell you, I heard some noises in there last night...
DIA_Novize_02_SQ508_Cutscene_03_02: ...but where did all those beasts come from?
DIA_Novize_01_SQ508_Cutscene_03_03: I am not going to tell the mages, cleaning up the graveyard is our assignment, and knowing their rules, we are the ones who will get in trouble for it.
